title: ‘Come together’ Sunak tells Conservatives after twin by-election blow

description: No amount of Tory spin can hide how ­disastrously their party performed in what were previously two safe Conservative seats - it's time we have a general election

title: The latest on the Israel-Hamas war
description: Israeli special forces have raided Nasser Hospital in Gaza, where the Hamas-run health ministry says multiple patients have died after power was lost. Follow for live updates.

title: Russian diplomats 'summoned' by UK Foreign Office over 'murder' of Putin opponent Alexei Navalny - as world leaders condemn death of Putin critic
description: The Foreign Office said today it has 'summoned the Russian Embassy to make clear that we hold the Russian authorities fully responsible' for the death of Navalny, 47.

title: Biden 'contemplating' steps to punish Moscow as world leaders blame 'monster' Putin for Navalny's death
description: UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has described Mr Navalny as the "fiercest advocate for Russian democracy", while French President Emmanuel Macron said his death shows the "weakness of the Kremlin and their fear of all opponents".

title: Lockdown backers to blame for UK recession, suggests minister
description: The Government’s “minister for common sense” has appeared to blame “everybody who voted for lockdown” for the British economy’s dip into recession. Cabinet Office Minister Esther McVey made the claim during an appearance on BBC Radio 4’s Any Questions, as she faced questions about who voters should hold responsible for the lack of growth.

title: Russian diplomats ‘summoned’ following Alexei Navalny’s death
description: Foreign Office officials have summoned the Russian Embassy amid anger in Western capitals over the death of jailed opposition leader Alexei Navalny.

title: Nigel Farage declares: Tory members want ME as their leader, not Rishi Sunak

title: Keir Starmer paid almost £100k in tax last year, summary of returns shows
